jobsJson.text: Senior Risk Data Analyst (Driver Food Fraud)
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Join in high impact, high priority fraud-busting activities in GOJEK. We are looking for a future leader who is passionate about breaking problems, experimenting, and finding solutions. 

Key skills required: 
● Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in big data sets 
● Capability to structure and solve complex issues 
● Investigate anomalies in data and operations 
● Point out potential weaknesses in products, systems, processes and recommend feasible preventive measures 
● Liaise with cross-functional teams to create anti-fraud tools for multiple use cases 
● Communicate frequently with internal stakeholders to share data insights 

Key traits: 
● Self-driven - able to make independent analysis and learn on the job 
● Analytical - data driven, able to synthesize idea and create insights from data 
● Relational - be able to reach out to people (mostly internal) and build working relationships with them 
● Resourceful - things that they will do has no knowledge base yet, so need to develop and piece together from all over the place 
● Have common sense - goes without saying. Need to have a basis for arguments and decisions
jobsJson.description:
Join in high impact, high priority fraud-busting activities in GOJEK. We are looking for a future leader who is passionate about breaking problems, experimenting, and finding solutions. 

Key skills required: 
● Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in big data sets 
● Capability to structure and solve complex issues 
● Investigate anomalies in data and operations 
● Point out potential weaknesses in products, systems, processes and recommend feasible preventive measures 
● Liaise with cross-functional teams to create anti-fraud tools for multiple use cases 
● Communicate frequently with internal stakeholders to share data insights 

Key traits: 
● Self-driven - able to make independent analysis and learn on the job 
● Analytical - data driven, able to synthesize idea and create insights from data 
● Relational - be able to reach out to people (mostly internal) and build working relationships with them 
● Resourceful - things that they will do has no knowledge base yet, so need to develop and piece together from all over the place 
● Have common sense - goes without saying. Need to have a basis for arguments and decisions
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor degree from reputable universities (degree in Computer Science, Business Analytics or related quantitative fields (Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics) is preferred) 
  • More than 3 years of experience in an analytical role 
  • Ability to write complex SQL queries and preferably experience with PostgreSQL, BigQuery, and data visualization tools (Tableau, etc)
  • Excellent communication skills (English is required) 
  • Experience working in fraud/risk/compliance areas is preferred 
  • Proficiency in one or more programming languages including but not limited to Python, R is preferred
